001package ca.gc.cra.radar.validation;
002
003import java.net.Inet6Address;
004import java.net.InetAddress;
005import java.net.UnknownHostException;
006import java.util.regex.Pattern;
007
008/**
009 * Network validation helpers for host:port inputs.
010 */
011public final class Net {
012  private static final Pattern HOST_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(
013      "(?i)^[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?(?:\\.[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?)*$");
014  private static final Pattern IPV4_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("^(?:[0-9]{1,3})(?:\\.[0-9]{1,3}){3}$");
015
016  private Net() {
017    // Utility
018  }
019
020  /**
021   * Validates host:port strings supporting hostnames, IPv4, and IPv6 literals.
022   *
023   * @param value candidate host:port
024   * @return normalized host:port string
025   */
026  public static String validateHostPort(String value) {
027    String sanitized = Strings.requireNonBlank("host:port", value);
028    String host;
029    String portPart;
030    if (sanitized.startsWith("[")) {
031      int idx = sanitized.indexOf(']');
032      if (idx < 0) {
033        throw new IllegalArgumentException("host:port must close IPv6 literal with ']'");
034      }
035      host = sanitized.substring(1, idx);
036      if (idx + 2 > sanitized.length() || sanitized.charAt(idx + 1) != ':') {
037        throw new IllegalArgumentException("host:port must include :<port> after IPv6 literal");
038      }
039      portPart = sanitized.substring(idx + 2);
040      validateIpv6(host);
041      sanitized = '[' + host + ']';
042    } else {
043      int lastColon = sanitized.lastIndexOf(':');
044      if (lastColon <= 0 || lastColon == sanitized.length() - 1) {
045        throw new IllegalArgumentException("host:port must use HOST:PORT format");
046      }
047      host = sanitized.substring(0, lastColon);
048      portPart = sanitized.substring(lastColon + 1);
049      if (host.contains(":")) {
050        throw new IllegalArgumentException("IPv6 host must be wrapped in [ ]");
051      }
052      validateHost(host);
053      sanitized = host;
054    }
055
056    int port;
057    try {
058      port = Integer.parseInt(portPart);
059    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
060      throw new IllegalArgumentException("port must be numeric (was " + portPart + ")", ex);
061    }
062    Numbers.requireRange("port", port, 1, 65535);
063    return sanitized + ':' + port;
064  }
065
066  private static void validateHost(String host) {
067    if (IPV4_PATTERN.matcher(host).matches()) {
068      String[] parts = host.split("\\.");
069      for (String part : parts) {
070        int octet = Integer.parseInt(part);
071        Numbers.requireRange("IPv4 octet", octet, 0, 255);
072      }
073      return;
074    }
075    if (!HOST_PATTERN.matcher(host).matches()) {
076      throw new IllegalArgumentException("invalid hostname: " + host);
077    }
078  }
079
080  private static void validateIpv6(String host) {
081    try {
082      InetAddress address = InetAddress.getByName(host);
083      if (!(address instanceof Inet6Address)) {
084        throw new IllegalArgumentException("invalid IPv6 literal: " + host);
085      }
086    } catch (UnknownHostException ex) {
087      throw new IllegalArgumentException("invalid IPv6 literal: " + host, ex);
088    }
089  }
090}
